cab.content: Military Secret./'Vo?ft Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,1st March 1920.2772. Malleson wires, 28th February, repeating Teheran : " Continuation our 2603. According to telegram from Northern Frontier, 25th February, "Bolsheviks are despatching troops and guns from Kizil Arvat to Gumbad-i-Kabuz through Yamut country."2. It is not clear whether this is merely attempt to assert Russian rights in that place, or whether it is part of a larger scheme to create trouble in Persia."3, I have directed my officer at Bujnurd to make every effort to find out -what is going on, and I suggest Intelligence Officer now en route to Caspian coast should receive similar instructions through Tehran."
